name: Colder Days
description:
This is Colder Days! A small prototype for Mini Jam: Warmth.

You are a soldier lost in a cold place and must keep following the magical campfires that appear throughout the room  to keep warm, see how long you can survive!

CONTROLS:

You move with WASD.

You can use your MOUSE to buy a speed upgrade, sacrificing some of your score but making keeping alive easier!

You can quit by pressing ESC.
